order.subject: Assignment of In-charge, Estate Section (Civil & Electrical)
order.body: In supersession of earlier order vide No F.NITA.2.(295-Estt)/2015/Vol-II/3194-3202, dated 20-06-2022 and based on the approval of the Competent Authority, Mr. Prajay Kumar Ray Barman, Estate Engineer (Cont), Estate Section is hereby assigned as In-charge, Estate Section (Civil & Electrical), NIT Agartala with immediate effect & until further order.
order.handoverInstructions: Dr. Surajit Das, Asstt. Professor (Gd.-I), Department of Civil Engineering, is instructed to hand over the full charges of Estate Section to Mr. Ray Barman, Estate Engineer (Cont), Estate Section at the earliest.

distributionList: Mr. Prajay Kumar Ray Barman, Estate Engineer(Cont.), Estate Section, NIT Agartala for compliance.
Dr. Surajit Das, Asstt. Professor (Gd.-I), Deptt. of Civil Engg. NIT Agartala for compliance.
P.S. to Director for kind information of the Director, NITA.
All Deans/ All HoDs,/All Chairman/ All Sectional Heads, NIT Aagartala.
The Chairman, Computing & ICT, NIT Agartala for information. He is requested to arrange uploading of the same in the Institute website
The Dy. Registrar (F&A), Deptt. of Finance & Accounts, NITA.
Personal file of the concerned officials.
